data.title: Maharani Mahal
highlights: Ceiling reflecting glass and crystal chandeliers
Ceiling reflecting glass and crystal chandeliers
data.description: Carved metal doors lead into hall lined with traditional arches; with its ceiling reflecting glass and crystal chandeliers.

data.title: Chandra Mahal
highlights: Twinkling decorative mirror work and large dome
Twinkling decorative mirror work and large dome
data.description: Hall for smaller public gatherings consisting large dome and twinkling decorative mirror work.

perfectEvents.title: The Perfect Event
perfectEvents.description: Begin your forever fairy-tale in the midst of magnificent palaces, upon magic of sand and waves or with the backdrop of snow capped peaks and gently flowing rivers.

data.title: MEETINGS
data.description: Choose from our unparalleled collection of meeting spaces across city hotels, beaches, hill resorts and royal palaces.Our team of experts will assist you at every step to ensure the most perfect and memorable event.

data.title: TIMELESS WEDDINGS
data.description: Celebrate with the palace in the backdrop and vast sky as the roof, this lawn makes an ideal with Palace backdrop. Extension of Oriental Terrace this is ideal for Soiree dinners and family celebrations.

weddings.title: Timeless Weddings
weddings.description: As you step into the threshold of everlasting love and togetherness, we are here to make sure your celebration is engraved in the history of Timeless Weddings.

data.title: BRIDAL SHOWER
data.description: Create a mark in history with a breathtaking wedding, situated in the magnificent palace where Maharajas once reigned.

data.title: A ROYAL WEDDING
data.description: Create a mark in history with a breathtaking wedding, situated in the magnificent palace where Maharajas once reigned.

socialMediaRefferences.title: #RambaghPalace
socialMediaRefferences.description: We invite you to experience, the finest traditions of Rajput hospitality. Come, hear the stories of ‘The Jewel of Jaipur’
